document_data.caption: Lake Muskar and surrounding area.
document_data.name: Lake Muskar
document_data.mainbody: '''Lake Muskar''' was the easternmost of the lakes forming the [[Teardrops]] in [[Narfell]].
document_data.Geography: Lake Muskar was the easternmost lake of the Teardrops, connected to the [[Muirenon Lake]] by a winding river, and fed by waters flowing westward from the [[Icerim Mountains]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[Ragnor (tribe)|Ragnor]] tribe lived along the northern Teardrop lakes of Muirenon and Muskar.
